Processing.title: AI Processing
Processing.description:
AI is meticulously analyzing your resume and reconstructing it into a professional format optimized for the global/local market.
Please wait as we extract text, select key achievements, and perform specialized translation.
Processing.warning: Please keep this page open to ensure stable processing. (Closing may interrupt the task)
Processing.tip: 3-Phase AI Processing: Reflects actual processing time for each stage. We select key achievements based on the source language before translation for the most accurate and efficient results.

extracting.label: Phase 1: Extraction
extracting.description: Extracting the original text accurately from PDF...
extracting.detail: Extracting proper nouns like company and school names exactly as they appear

refining.label: Phase 2: Refinement
refining.description: Selecting key achievements based on the source language...

refining_target.label: Phase 3: Refinement
refining_target.detail: Optimizing expressions for Korean recruitment standards

translating.label: Phase 3: Translation
translating.detail: Translating into professional English using Action Verbs

translating_en_ko.label: Phase 2: Translation
translating_en_ko.description: Translating English into Korean for the local market...
translating_en_ko.detail: Localized translation suitable for the Korean job market

Processing.done_message: Analysis is complete! Moving to the next step...

Edit.title: Edit
Edit.subtitle: Review and edit the content analyzed by AI.

tip.title: You can edit content directly by clicking it
tip.description: Edit the original content and click the [Sync & Retranslate] button to have AI re-translate according to the changes. Delete unnecessary items using the trash icon.

personal.title: Personal Information
personal.description: Manage essential details such as name, contact information, and professional summary.
personal.name: Name

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: List your professional experience and key achievements in reverse chronological order.

education.title: Education
education.description: Provide details about your educational background, starting with the most recent.
education.empty: Click the {button} button above to add education.

skills.title: Core Skills
skills.description: Add your key technical skills or professional competencies as keywords.

additional.title: Additional Info
additional.description: Add certifications, awards, languages, activities, and other details.
additional.empty: Click the {button} button above to add certifications, awards, or activities.

pricingPreview.note: * 5 credits deducted per resume creation. free for pass holders or 1 credit for free users for re-translations.

q1.q: Does the Korean resume format matter?
q1.a: No, we support most PDF formats including free-form and downloads from job sites. AI extracts and analyzes text regardless of complexity.

q2.q: Can I edit the translated content?
q2.a: Yes! After AI conversion, you can freely edit the summary and English translation in our editor. Use Split View to refine it alongside the original.

q3.a: We provide 10 credits monthly for you to try the service. It's enough to complete and download a resume, but we recommend a pass for premium templates and unlimited edits.

cta.title: Start Your Global Career Now
cta.subtitle: Stop worrying about English resumes with ApplyGoGo.
